attributes.action: ensure that football ticket pricing is made both fair and reasonable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long it has football tickets have been overpriced to fill the wallets of both overpaid players and agents. There should be a cap on ticket prices to ensure the national sport remains within the grasp of regular people.Without this the potential bid for a Wotld Cup will be pointless as fans will not be able to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
